org.jetel.data

Class DataFieldFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.data.DataFieldFactory

  • public abstract class DataFieldFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory Pattern which creates different types of DataField objects (subclasses) based on specified data field type.
    Since:
    May 2, 2002

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static DataFieldFactory DATA_FIELD_WITH_INVALID_STATE
      This field factory creates DataFieldWithInvalidState instead of regular DataFieldImpl.

      DataFieldFactory()

      • createDataField

        public static final DataField createDataField(DataFieldType fieldType,
                        DataFieldMetadata fieldMetadata,
                        boolean plain)
        Factory which creates data field based on specified field type and metadata. You should use this method whenever you want to create a data field.
        Parameters:
        fieldType - One of the recognized Data Field Types
        fieldMetadata - metadata reference
        Returns:
        new data field object
        Since:
        May 2, 2002

      • createDataField

        public static final DataField createDataField(DataFieldMetadata fieldMetadata,
                        boolean plain)
        Simplified version of previous. Gets field type from metadata.
        Parameters:
        fieldMetadata - Metadata describing field's characteristics (eg. data-type, size)
        Returns:
